name: LitePuff - Tech Demo
description:
This is a mechanics showcase of what will be available in LitePuff. I'd really appreciate it if you guys took a minute to fill out the following form with as much detail as you can!

LitePuff is a story about a small creature that makes all the difference in the world. Once this demo's stable, I will begin working on the game's story demo, so stay tuned and follow me on Twitter for updates!
